name: Air Fighter
description:
When AI-Controlled planes get out of control, and the world is in danger, it's your job to save the day, so hop on to jet fighter and prepare to fight to the death.

In this retro-like shoot em up high-score game, you can  control your plane using your keyboard and mouse like this:

WASD or Arrow keys - to move around
Left Mouse Click - to shoot the machine guns
Right Mouse Click - launch a missile

For play,  just decompress and execute AirFigther.exe

This is my first ever publish game, I hope you found it funny, if you have any comment about it i would be glad to hear it
